GSD.product_version: versions from v4.5 to before v5.4.220
GSD.description:
soc: qcom: smsm: Fix refcount leak bugs in qcom_smsm_probe()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.220 by commit 1e3ed59370c712df436791efed120f0c082aa9bc, it was introduced in version v4.5 by commit c97c4090ff72297a878a37715bd301624b71c885. For more details please see the references link.
